title: Manohari Emerald & Diamond Haaram - A Timeless Treasure
materials: Vivid Green). Features our signature Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: This exquisite haaram showcases a modern take on traditional South Indian design. It features intricate filigree work studded with sparkling diamonds, creating a delicate, lace-like effect. The pear-cut emeralds add a touch of regal elegance. The setting style ensures maximum light reflection, enhancing the brilliance of both the diamonds and emeralds. The piece incorporates a contemporary clasp for easy wear.
colors: Primarily gold with brilliant white diamonds and vibrant green emeralds.
occasions: and special occasions like Seemantham. Its sophisticated design also makes it suitable for high-end parties and contemporary events.
description: This Manohari Emerald & Diamond Haaram is a true investment piece, blending timeless elegance with modern design. The combination of high-quality diamonds and vibrant emeralds creates a captivating look. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting shine and durability. It's a statement piece that celebrates South Indian heritage while complementing modern sensibilities. Each gemstone is hand-selected for its quality and brilliance.
